original_title: El hombre perseguido por un O.V.N.I.
overview: Alberto Oliver, an unsuccessful pulp novelist, is attacked by alien mutants when he comes back from visiting his lover Carol. Soon he finds himself chased by a flying saucer that tries to abduct him and take him to a distant planet in an anti-matter galaxy.
tagline: A man chased by flying saucers
title: The Man of Ganimedes
